Game: Winterbells

25 Sep 2011

Go to the Game: www.ferryhalim.com Task: Jump at as many bells / pigeons with your arctic hare as possible How to play: The arctic hare jumps automatically. You choose the direction in which he jumps / flies with your mouse. My Record: 44,960
